name: BPopover
desc: A Popover can be used as an alternative to a Drop Down Menu that can contain elements inside. Any suitable combination of components can be used.
sample:
(this.root = ref)}>
test content

infoArray.name: anchorEl
infoArray.desc: This is the DOM element that will be used to set the position of the popover.

infoArray.name: anchorOrigin
infoArray.desc: This is the point on the anchor where the popover's targetOrigin will attach to. Options: vertical: [top, center, bottom] horizontal: [left, middle, right].

infoArray.name: animated
infoArray.desc: If true, the popover will apply transitions when it is added to the DOM.

infoArray.name: animation
infoArray.desc: Override the default animation component used.

infoArray.name: autoCloseWhenOffScreen
infoArray.desc: If true, the popover will hide when the anchor is scrolled off the screen.

infoArray.name: canAutoPosition
infoArray.desc: If true, the popover (potentially) ignores targetOrigin and anchorOrigin to make itself fit on screen, which is useful for mobile devices.

infoArray.name: className
infoArray.desc: The CSS class name of the root element.

infoArray.name: open
infoArray.desc: If true, the popover is visible.

infoArray.name: manualOpen
infoArray.desc: Function can be called when the popover is requested to be opened.

infoArray.name: manualClose
infoArray.desc: Function can be called when the popover is requested to be closed.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: targetOrigin
infoArray.desc: This is the point on the popover which will attach to the anchor's origin. Options: vertical: [top, center, bottom] horizontal: [left, middle, right].

infoArray.name: useLayerForClickAway
infoArray.desc: If true, the popover will render on top of an invisible layer, which will prevent clicks to the underlying elements, and trigger an onRequestClose('clickAway') call.

infoArray.name: onRequestClose
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the popover is requested to be closed. reason: The reason for the close request. Possibles values are 'clickAway' and 'offScreen'.
